title: Falling for the Monster in My Bed
description: After years of pills and therapy, I accepted the monster under my bed was a figment of my imagination. I was wrong. Now the monster is back, and he wants in my bed.Asmon’anoth-noctai is an incubus hellbent on seducing me with his lithe tail and devilishly soft mouth. If he succeeds he’ll be set free and I’ll be demon-smitten forever. I’m supposed to be straight, but when we’re alone in the dark I ache to explore every temptation he offers.Soon our nights blur together, and I’m falling fast. I have to wake up from this nightmare before I hit the ground… but what if I don’t want to?Falling for the Monster in My Bed is a 27k sweet and steamy MM paranormal romance between a human and a demon who lacks personal boundaries. It features just one bed, a bisexual awakening, forced proximity, first times, tail play, and HEA. The Second Edition includes an expanded epilogue.CONTENT NOTES: includes discussions of mental illness and biphobia.
author: Arden Lake
